Html:
Hi, I have a problem running the TouchlessDemo.exe, im using Windows7 and when I run the application the form displays then a message says that "TouchlessDemo has stopped working".

I run in debug mode the source code files and here's an error.

AccessViolationException was unhandled.
Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt.

Edit:
I got it running.. have to change this

comboBoxCameras.SelectedIndex = 0; to comboBoxCameras.SelectedIndex = 1;
